__e: We have to give them a Christian burial.
If it be God's will I die, I would have a decent Christian burial.
Whoever they are, though they're strangers they're at least entitled to a Christian burial.
Maybe he just wanted to be immortal. All you have to do to be immortal is lead a good Christian life.
I testify that Alexander Sextus of Rome is no pope! He is no Christian!
But this man here is a Christian, and he's written that in order to believe--
